mapper.insert: INSERT INTO recruit VALUES(0, #{recruit.com_no}, #{recruit.career}, #{recruit.education}, #{recruit.skill}, #{recruit.field},#{recruit.pay},#{recruit.location},#{recruit.working_time},#{recruit.rank}, #{recruit.title}, null, #{recruit.qualification},#{recruit.welfare},#{recruit.seprocedure},#{recruit.notice}, NOW(), #{recruit.deadline_date}, #{recruit.p_number})
